[IMG]http://i69.photobucket.com/albums/i58/lord_terabyte/l_amour_en_fuite0.jpg[/IMG]

[QUOTE]Francois Truffaut took a few steps toward modernism with this very self-conscious experiment in narrative form (1979). It&#039;s not so much another episode in the Antoine Doinel cycle as a reflection on it, using extensive clips from the previous features to examine the ways in which art devours life--a theme that has always been present in Truffaut&#039;s autobiographical cinema, but never so directly stated. Still, the results are more interesting than satisfying; it is a film more thought than felt. With Jean-Pierre Leaud, Marie-France Pisier, and Claude Jade.[/QUOTE]
